: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus blasts off the ground, transforming to robot mode. Hydras blasts strike below him.
Rodimus Prime: Not now Hydras. I have a higher priority then you!
Rodimus goes right over Hydras and comes down trying to tackle Carnation, who looked like Rodimus at this time.
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras landed with a bang. He shot a fireball from each dragon head at 
rodimus. He then transformed to robot mode. "Come on Rodimus lets do this!" He 
pulled out his two swords and stood ready."
Carnatron turned into Rodimus and fired shots at aeroutar. "Flicker run! Ill 
cover you" he sent him telepathicly
> Nightlight::
> 
> Nighlight didn't moved, she was stunned and sedated. She only could 
> heard confuses voices that she couldn't understand.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >        He finally covers the final distance to catch up with 
> flicker and 
> > lands between him and Nightlight.  "Nightlight, run.  NOW!"  He 
> puts his arms 
> > and wings out to his side, thus making both an effective screen and 
> a sign 
> > that he was unarmed.  "Don't you understand Flicker.  To Rodimus, 
> no Maximal 
> > is expendable."
> 
>
